# Hayhooks

> Deploy and serve Haystack Pipelines and Agents as REST APIs

Hayhooks turns Haystack Pipelines and Agents into production-ready REST APIs, bundling deployment, observability, lifecycle tooling, and native Model Context Protocol (MCP) endpoints for MCP-aware clients such as Cursor or Claude Desktop.

## Features

- [OpenAI Compatibility](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/openai-compatibility/index.md): Use Hayhooks with OpenAI-compatible clients.
- [MCP Support](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/mcp-support/index.md): Using Hayhooks as an MCP Server for Haystack Pipelines and Agents.
- [Chainlit Integration](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/chainlit-integration/index.md): Embed a Chainlit chat UI directly in Hayhooks.
- [Open WebUI Integration](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/openwebui-integration/index.md): Connect Hayhooks to Open WebUI.
- [File Upload Support](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/file-upload-support/index.md): Handle file uploads inside pipeline runs.
- [File Response Support](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/file-response-support/index.md): Return binary files (images, PDFs, audio) from pipeline endpoints.
- [CLI Commands](https://deepset-ai.github.io/hayhooks/features/cli-commands/index.md): Discover the Hayhooks command-line tooling.
